statistics.description: Users share your videos on social networks and bring new viewers.
Users perform targeted actions and subscribe to your newsletter.
Players re-watch your video and re-play the game.

example.headline: Marketing quest based on advertiser video
example.description: We analyze the content of your video and generate a quest based on the data obtained. The created video quest will contain game elements, links and your advertisement.

cards.headline: CYBERSPORT BRANDED GAMES
cards.description: Creation of interactive games based on e-sports broadcasts or videos, with the addition of sponsor branded elements. Mechanics allows you to hold contests or collect player content.

cards.headline: OFFLINE GAMES AT THE STAND FOR CONFERENCES, EXHIBITIONS ...
cards.description: Create interactive games for offline posting exhibitions and conferences. The user is invited to play the game on the big screen using the game console or placed on the tablet. Mechanics allow you to hold contests or collect player contacts.

cards.headline: GAMES FROM ADVERTISING VIDEOS
cards.description: Creation of interactive games based on clientâ€™s promotional videos. Allows you to draw attention to the brand and increase conversion. Mechanics allows you to hold contests promo codes or collect contacts of players.

cards.headline: GAMES BASED ON CYBERSPORTS CONTENT
cards.description: Creating interactive games based on online role-playing games. Allows you to draw attention to streamers and gaming activities. Mechanics allow you to hold contests or collect player contacts.

contacts.headline: Any questions? Contact us!
contacts.description: We will be happy to communicate.
